message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15000?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider the value I've put into this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $16500.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on a price of $14000?
